languages.text: "Шерин... может быть, довольно дозволять жиреющим кардиналам и их служкам творить с вашим народом что им вздумается? Приструните их — вера в Великого не в чинах и титулах, а сердцах и руках простых людей. И вера эта многообразна! Позвольте тем, на чьих плечах покоится благополучие Даргонуса, хотя бы выбирать, как молиться Ему — возьмите малые культы под защиту!"

"Shereen... perhaps you should stop allowing the fat cardinals and their servants to do whatever they want to your people? Rein them in — faith in the Exalted One is not contained within ranks and titles, but within the hearts and hands of the common people. And even this can take many forms as well! Let those who shoulder the welfare of Dargonus at least choose in which manner they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"
languages.original_text: "Шерин... может быть, довольно дозволять жиреющим кардиналам и их служкам творить с вашим народом что им вздумается? Приструните их — вера в Великого не в чинах и титулах, а сердцах и руках простых людей. И вера эта многообразна! Позвольте тем, на чьих плечах покоится благополучие Даргонуса, хотя бы выбирать, как молиться Ему — возьмите малые культы под защиту!"

Rein them in — the faith in the Exalted one is not contained within the ranks and titles, but within the hearts and hands of the common people. And can take many forms as well! Let those who shoulder the well-being of Dargonus to at least choose the way they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"

Let those who shoulder the welfare of Dargonus at least choose in which manner they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"

languages.text: “亲爱的……或许你可以阻止那些大腹便便的红衣主教，约束他们一下，让他们别再对你的人民为所欲为？我们对至高无上的神皇保持虔诚，我们的信仰并非体现在等级与头衔之中，而是体现在普通人的心里和手中。既然如此，人们的信仰同样可以有多种形式！那些人肩负着达戈努斯福祉，他们至少应该可以自主选择祷告的方式。把那些小型教派置于你的保护之下吧！”
languages.original_text: "Shereen... perhaps you should stop allowing the fat cardinals and their servants to do whatever they want to your people? Rein them in — faith in the Exalted One is not contained within ranks and titles, but within the hearts and hands of the common people. And even this can take many forms as well! Let those who shoulder the welfare of Dargonus at least choose in which manner they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的……或许你可以阻止那些大腹便便的红衣主教，约束他们一下，让他们别再对你的人民为所欲为？我们对至高无上的神皇保持虔诚，我们的信仰并非体现在等级与头衔之中，而是体现在普通人的心里和手中。既然如此，人们的信仰同样可以有多种形式！那些人肩负着达戈努斯福祉，他们至少应该可以自主选择祷告的方式。把那些小型教派置于你的保护之下吧！”

languages.text: «Shereen... ¿quizá deberías dejar de permitir que los cardenales gordinflones y sus sirvientes hagan lo que quieran con tu pueblo? Contrólalos. La fe en el Exaltado no está en los rangos y los títulos, sino en los corazones y las manos del pueblo llano. ¡E incluso esto también puede tener muchas formas! Deja que aquellos que cargan con el bienestar de Dargonus elijan cómo rezarle. ¡Toma a los cultos menores bajo tu protección!».
languages.original_text: "Shereen... perhaps you should stop allowing the fat cardinals and their servants to do whatever they want to your people? Rein them in — faith in the Exalted One is not contained within ranks and titles, but within the hearts and hands of the common people. And even this can take many forms as well! Let those who shoulder the welfare of Dargonus at least choose in which manner they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"

traits.locale_text: «Shereen... ¿quizá deberías dejar de permitir que los cardenales gordinflones y sus sirvientes hagan lo que quieran con tu pueblo? Contrólalos. La fe en el Exaltado no está en los rangos y los títulos, sino en los corazones y las manos del pueblo llano. ¡E incluso esto también puede tener muchas formas! Deja que aquellos que cargan con el bienestar de Dargonus elijan cómo rezarle. ¡Toma a los cultos menores bajo tu protección!».

languages.text: シェリーン...デブの枢機卿らとその従者らが、民にやりたい放題するのをそろそろ止めた方が良いんじゃないかい？アイツらを抑制するのだ...エグザルテッド・ワンへの信仰は、地位や称号にあるのではなく、一般人民の心と手の中にあるのさ。そのうえ、それにも様々な形でできるものだ！ダルゴナスの幸福を肩代わりする者たちに、少なくとも祈る方法を選ばせ、魔女団の少数派を保護下に置くんだな！」
languages.original_text: "Shereen... perhaps you should stop allowing the fat cardinals and their servants to do whatever they want to your people? Rein them in — faith in the Exalted One is not contained within ranks and titles, but within the hearts and hands of the common people. And even this can take many forms as well! Let those who shoulder the welfare of Dargonus at least choose in which manner they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"

traits.locale_text: シャリーン...デブの枢機卿らとその従者らが、民にやりたい放題するのをそろそろ止めた方が良いんじゃないかい？アイツらを抑制するのだ...エグザルテッド・ワンへの信仰は、地位や称号にあるのではなく、一般人民の心と手の中にあるのさ。そのうえ、それにも様々な形でできるものだ！ダルゴナスの幸福を肩代わりする者たちに、少なくとも祈る方法を選ばせ、魔女団の少数派を保護下に置くんだな！」

languages.text: « Shereen... vous devriez peut-être interdire à ces gros pleins de soupe de cardinaux et leurs serviteurs de faire ce qu'ils veulent à vos gens. Bridez-les, la foi de l'Exalté n'est pas dans les titres des puissants, mais dans le cœur et les mains de la population et elle peut y prendre de nombreuses formes ! Laissons ceux qui s'occupent du bien-être de Dargonus choisir au moins leur manière de Le vénérer. Prenez les cultes mineurs sous votre protection. »
languages.original_text: "Shereen... perhaps you should stop allowing the fat cardinals and their servants to do whatever they want to your people? Rein them in — faith in the Exalted One is not contained within ranks and titles, but within the hearts and hands of the common people. And even this can take many forms as well! Let those who shoulder the welfare of Dargonus at least choose in which manner they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"

traits.locale_text: « Shereen... vous devriez peut-être interdire à ces gros pleins de soupe de cardinaux et leurs serviteurs de faire ce qu'ils veulent à vos gens. Bridez-les, la foi de l'Exalté n'est pas dans les titres des puissants, mais dans le cœur et les mains de la population et elle peut y prendre de nombreuses formes ! Laissons ceux qui s'occupent du bien-être de Dargonus choisir au moins leur manière de Le vénérer. Prenez les cultes mineurs sous votre protection. »

languages.text: "Shereen ... vielleicht solltet Ihr den fetten Kardinälen und ihren Dienern nicht mehr erlauben, mit Euren Untertanen zu tun, was sie wollen? Gebietet ihnen Einhalt. Der Glaube an den Erhabenen liegt nicht in Posten und Titeln, sondern in den Herzen und Händen der einfachen Leute. Und selbst das kann viele Formen annehmen! Lasst jene, die das Wohlergehen von Dargonus auf ihren Schultern tragen, wenigstens entscheiden, wie sie dem Imperator huldigen wollen — stellt die kleineren Kulte unter Euren Schutz!"
languages.original_text: "Shereen... perhaps you should stop allowing the fat cardinals and their servants to do whatever they want to your people? Rein them in — faith in the Exalted One is not contained within ranks and titles, but within the hearts and hands of the common people. And even this can take many forms as well! Let those who shoulder the welfare of Dargonus at least choose in which manner they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen ... vielleicht solltet Ihr den fetten Kardinälen und ihren Dienern nicht mehr erlauben, mit Euren Untertanen zu tun, was sie wollen? Gebietet ihnen Einhalt. Der Glaube an den Erhabenen liegt nicht in Posten und Titeln, sondern in den Herzen und Händen der einfachen Leute. Und selbst das kann viele Formen annehmen! Lasst jene, die das Wohlergehen von Dargonus auf ihren Schultern tragen, wenigstens entscheiden, wie sie dem Imperator huldigen wollen — stellt die kleineren Kulte unter Euren Schutz!"

languages.text: "Şirinim... Belki de şişko kardinaller ve hizmetkârlarının halkına karşı paşa gönülleri nasıl isterse öyle davranmalarını engellemelisin. Dizginle onları. Görkemli'nin inancı, yalnızca rütbelerden ve ünvanlardan ibaret değildir. Aynı zamanda sıradan yurttaşların yüreklerinde ve ellerinde de yatar. Bu bile farklı suretlere bürünebilir! Dargonus'un iyiliğini üstlenenlere en azından O'na ne şekilde dua edeceklerini seçme şansı tanı. Ufak çaplı tarikatları koruman altına al!"
languages.original_text: "Shereen... perhaps you should stop allowing the fat cardinals and their servants to do whatever they want to your people? Rein them in — faith in the Exalted One is not contained within ranks and titles, but within the hearts and hands of the common people. And even this can take many forms as well! Let those who shoulder the welfare of Dargonus at least choose in which manner they pray to Him — take the minor cults under your protection!"
